intro.title: Let's Learn Subtraction!
intro.narration: Hello, friends! Today, we are going to have some fun with subtraction. We will learn how to subtract 4 from 9. Are you ready? Letâ€™s jump in!

explanation.title: Understanding Subtraction
explanation.narration: Subtraction is when we take away a number from another number. If we have 9 apples and we give away 4 apples, we want to find out how many apples we have left. So, we can say 9 minus 4. Let's find out the answer together!

practice_mcq.title: Time for Some Practice!
practice_mcq.question: What is 9 - 4?
practice_mcq.explanation: Great job! When we take 4 away from 9, we are left with 5. So, 9 minus 4 equals 5!

summary.title: Wrapping Up!
summary.narration: Awesome work today, everyone! We learned how to subtract 4 from 9 and found out that the answer is 5. Remember, subtraction helps us know how many we have left after taking some away. Keep practicing, and you'll be a subtraction superstar!
